our_candidate.name: Will Patterson
our_candidate.background: State Attorney General, former federal prosecutor, military veteran, Charlotte native, moderate positioning

opponent.name: Russell Chambers
opponent.background: Lt. Governor, inflammatory rhetoric, scandal-plagued (offensive online comments surfaced), extreme positions on abortion and education

demographics.economic_profile: Banking industry (Charlotte), tech and biotech (Research Triangle), military bases, growing transplant population, manufacturing legacy

notes: Decisive win (+8.5%) driven by opponent scandal. Chambers' offensive online comments and extreme positions made him unacceptable to suburban voters who otherwise lean Republican. Patterson's prosecutor/veteran background provided credibility on crime and security. Charlotte suburbs and Research Triangle delivered massive margins. Even some rural voters crossed over due to Chambers' character. Race demonstrates importance of candidate quality and how scandal can collapse a candidacy.
